text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the response to state that under Article 3 of the Regulatory Reform (Fire Safety) Order 2005, the responsible person is defined as (a) the employer if the workplace is under their control, (b) the person in control of the premises for business purposes, or (c) the owner if no one else has such control. The candidate answer discusses the 'Identification of the \u201cResponsible Person\u201d (RP)' in a table format, mentioning the Fire Safety Order and the duty of the RP, but it does not explicitly quote or state the three-part definition found in Article 3 of the RRFSO 2005 as required by the criterion.", "criterion_id": "9b58827b-8cab-4583-8aa8-476d0c2cc5b8"}
